title: Instagram Overview
content: Instagram is a social networking app focused on photo and video sharing.

title: Why are my posts not showing?
content: Check internet, refresh feed, ensure account is not shadowbanned.

title: How to Post a Photo
content: Open the app, click +, choose photo, apply filter, share.

title: How to recover a hacked account?
content: Use 'Forgot password', contact support if email changed.

title: How to Use Stories
content: Tap your profile picture, add media, share story.

title: IGTV
content: Longer videos up to 60 minutes

title: How to make account private?
content: Go to settings → privacy → toggle private account.

title: How to Shop on Instagram
content: Browse tagged products, tap buy now, checkout.

title: How to Create an Account
content: Step by step guide to sign up on Instagram

title: Hashtags
content: Use hashtags to increase content reach

title: Business Tools
content: Instagram provides analytics and promotion features for business accounts.

title: Ads
content: Businesses can run targeted ads

title: Shopping
content: Sell and buy products directly in-app

title: Why can't I log in?
content: Make sure your username and password are correct, reset if forgotten.

title: Live
content: Go live to interact with followers in real-time

title: Direct Messaging
content: Private messages with users and groups

title: How to Go Live
content: Swipe right, choose Live, tap button to broadcast.

title: Community Guidelines
content: Instagram enforces policies to keep users safe and respectful.

title: How do I verify my account?
content: Go to settings → account → request verification.

title: Reels
content: Short video clips with audio and effects

title: Explore Tab
content: Discover trending content and accounts

title: Stories
content: Create short-lived content that disappears after 24h

title: Posting Photos
content: How to share photos with followers
